simplepasteimage-desc: The extension allows users to auto-upload images when they paste text to VisualEditor. Unique image names are constructed from a page name and a random suffix.
simplepasteimage-warning-uncatchable: Warning of type [$1] could not be handled
simplepasteimage-error-uncatchable: $1 The image has not been uploaded.
simplepasteimage-notification-error-inco: The image extension could not be correctly detected or the extension is not supported. Supported extensions: $1.
simplepasteimage-notification-error-unkn: Unknown error. The image has not been uploaded.
